hero.imageAlt: Holy Queen's Way landscape at sunset
hero.description: The Holy Queen's Way: Where history meets serenity. Explore Portugal's untamed landscapes and savor the rich heritage of a path built on peace and tradition.

pathSelection.title: Choose Your Path
pathSelection.description: Whether you prefer the slow rhythm of walking or the speed of gravel biking, the Queen's Way offers a unique perspective.

hiking.title: Historical Path
hiking.description: Walk the ancient royal paths through dense forests and historic villages. Feel the connection to the pilgrims of the past on this meticulously preserved route.

cycling.title: Gravel Adventure
cycling.description: Challenge yourself on rugged terrains and scenic gravel roads. Designed for gravel and mountain bikes, this route offers speed, flow, and breathtaking views.

pathsPage.title: Explore Paths
pathsPage.subtitle: Discover the natural and historical beauty of our region

mondego.title: Mondego Valley
mondego.description: A gentle route along the Mondego river, ideal for families and nature photography enthusiasts.

mountain.title: Estrela Summit
mountain.description: A vertical challenge for experienced cyclists with panoramic views over the entire central region.
